thread.section_title: Hotel Adele & Jules - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: BEAUTIFUL HOTEL
thread.title_full: BEAUTIFUL HOTEL - Review of Hotel Adele & Jules, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: laurab88978
title: BEAUTIFUL HOTEL
text:
Just the most stunning hotel I've stayed in. The decor was beautiful and the staff where beyond helpful. I truly enjoyed my stay! The surrounding area is also great for food and a short walk to all the tourist attractions, so a great location.
Room Tip: I stayed in the boulevard room which had a small terrace which was so nice! See more room tips
